dcterms:description: This dataset provides a technical report on small cell enhancements for E-UTRA and E-UTRAN, which is foundational for understanding dual connectivity in wireless networks.
dcterms:title: 3GPP TR 36.842

dcterms:description: This dataset outlines the overall description of multi-connectivity for UMTS, LTE, and 5G, providing essential specifications for dual connectivity.
dcterms:title: 3GPP TS 37.340

dcterms:creator: P. E. Iturria-Rivera
M. Erol-Kantarci
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a study on QoS-aware load balancing in wireless networks using Clipped Double Q-Learning, which is relevant for optimizing handover processes.
dcterms:title: Clipped Double Q-Learning

dcterms:creator: T. D. Kulkarni
K. R. Narasimhan
A. Saeedi
J. B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses hierarchical deep reinforcement learning, integrating temporal abstraction and intrinsic motivation, which is applied in the context of optimizing handover in wireless networks.
dcterms:title: Hierarchical deep reinforcement learning

dcterms:creator: M. Polese
M. Giordani
M. Mezzavilla
S. Rangan
M. Zorzi
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into improving handover through dual connectivity in 5G mmWave mobile networks, which is crucial for understanding the performance of dual connectivity solutions.
dcterms:title: Improved Handover Through Dual Connectivity in 5G mmWave Mobile Networks

dcterms:creator: M. Mezzavilla
M. Zhang
M. Polese
R. Ford
S. Dutta
S. Rangan
M. Zorzi
dcterms:description: This dataset details an end-to-end simulation of 5G mmWave networks, providing a framework for evaluating the performance of dual connectivity algorithms.
dcterms:title: End-to-End Simulation of 5G mmWave Networks

dcterms:creator: H. Yin
P. Liu
K. Liu
L. Cao
L. Zhang
Y. Gao
X. Hei
dcterms:description: This dataset fosters artificial intelligence algorithms for networking research, providing a platform for integrating AI with network simulations.
dcterms:title: Ns3-Ai: Fostering Artificial Intelligence Algorithms for Networking Research
